'''Some words about myself:'''
I'm a student of business information systems and information systems at TU Darmstadt. I'm working a lot with platform independent webservices to exchange data over the internet. These systems work mostly in Linux so I decided to get to know a different operating system than Windows. I tried some Linux distributions before i found Ubuntu. Ubuntu was the first which runs on my system without lack of important functions and without a big nowlege to fix this yourself. I try to get more experience with this and hopefully can share it ...
